Help Index File

This documentation is provided for information purposes only! 3rd party developers should not modify the DAZ Studio Help Index File. All changes to this file must be made by DAZ 3D, if you feel a change to the index file is in order, please contact the DAZ Studio development team.

The root level of the DAZ Studio help system is defined by the help index file. This file is named 'helpindex.dsx' and can be found in the '/docs/' folder in the DAZ Studio install location. It is read every time DAZ Studio is started to load all the inline documentation for DAZ Studio. It is a simple XML file that follows the structure of the example below:

    <DAZStudioHelpIndex Version="1.0" >
        <helpFile location="DAZStudio/dazstudiohelp.dsx" />
        <helpDirectory location="Plugins" label="Plugins" />
        <helpDirectory location="Tutorials" label="Tutorials" />
        <helpFile location="links.dsx" />
        <helpFile location="DAZScript/dazscripthelp.dsx" />
    </DAZStudioHelpIndex>

The schema is a very simple one:

  • DAZStudioHelpIndex
    • helpFile
    • helpDirectory

DAZStudioHelpIndex

This must be the top element in the DAZ Studio Help Index file. It declares the contents as being the help index for DAZ Studio, and specifies the version number of the file.

Parent Elements: none

ChildElements: helpFile, helpDirectory

Attributes:

  • version Specifies the version number of the file - currently, 1.0

helpFile

This element specifies a single additional help file that will be read into the help system.

Parent Elements: DAZStudioHelpIndex

ChildElements: none

Attributes:

  • location Contains the path to the additional help file, relative to the help index file.

helpDirectory

This element specifies a directory which will be scanned for additional help files that will be read into the system. It is assumed that help in the specified directory will be organized into subdirectories, so each subdirectory in the specified directory will be scanned for additional help files with the '.dsx' extension.

Parent Elements: DAZStudioHelpIndex

ChildElements: none

Attributes:

  • location Specifies the directory path, relative to the help index file.
  • label Specifies the label of the entry in the help table of contents that all additional help files found will be added under.
  • ref (optional) Specifies an html document that will be loaded in the help browser when the user selects this item in the table of contents. The path may be relative to the help index, or may be an absolute http link.
